name: Quest for Colonel Donuts
description:
Embark on a quest through the sky, out of a cannon, to find Colonel Donuts! Can you do it?

This game was made as a part of the Mini Jam 56 in only 72 hours.

This was my first game in Godot. Was it ok, or even fun? Please leave feedback! 

Controls:

Z to shoot

X to use your screen clearing flashbang!

WASD or arrow keys to move

Enter to interact with menus

New features/bugfixes/QOL improvements to be added soon!

Credits:

Lead game Designer: Catbattle
Lead Programmer: Catbattle
Music tracks provided by YouFulca
Spritework by Destiny Labs
SFX by fesliyan studios
QA testers: Vess Naegiri
Programming assistance: The lovely folks over at the Godot discord

Note: Crashes and major bugs may occur. A patch will be sent out soon after further playtesting and bugfixing, so please hold on tight! If you find a bug, please report it in the comments below! 

Known bugs:

- Health icons despawn prematurely when enemy bullets collide with screen sides. 

Ver 0.2 changes:

- Fixed bug related to victory screen not displaying properly

- Fixed bug related to enemy overspawn in bossfights

- Improved optimization of bossfight behaviors

- Fixed bug related to music track timings in Level 2

-Balanced out music volume a lot better

This may be the last/only new version, despite how much more I want to do with the game. I hope you enjoy it!
